query:
ALTER TABLE oauth_tokens 
ADD COLUMN dotloopAccountId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopProfileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopDefaultProfileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopProfileIds TEXT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 24ruGQuiASWpGv5.root --database gtMbYvvduSqhsHRvj39YWw --execute ALTER TABLE oauth_tokens 
ADD COLUMN dotloopAccountId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopProfileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopDefaultProfileId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dotloopProfileIds TEXT NULL;
